import React, { useState } from 'react' import avatarPreview from '../../../Assets/Imagesused/Profile.png' import 'boxicons' import './AdminDashboard.css' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Chart from "react-apexcharts"; export const AdminDashboard = () => { const { val } = useSelector((state) => state.toggle); console.log(val); const chart= { chart: { height: 200, type: "radialBar" }, series: [70], plotOptions: { radialBar: { hollow: { margin: 15, size: "70%" }, dataLabels: { showOn: "always", name: { show: false, }, value: { offsetY: 5, color: "#111", fontSize: "30px", show: true } } } }, stroke: { lineCap: "line", }, labels: ["Progress"] }; return (
